mapper.sql: id, red_money, create_time, finish_time, customer_id, brand_id, shop_detail_id, red_remainder_money, red_type, order_id, state
mapper.select: select trp.shop_detail_id shopDetailId,IFNULL(COUNT(1),0) redCount,IFNULL(SUM(red_money),0) redMoney, IFNULL((SUM((select COUNT(1) from ( select top.result_data from tb_order td inner join tb_order_payment_item top on td.id = top.order_id where td.order_state in (2,10,11,12) and IF(td.is_pos_pay = 1,td.is_pos_pay = 1,td.production_status in (2,3)) and top.payment_mode_id in (${payMode}) and top.pay_time >= CONCAT(#{useBeginDate},' 00:00:00') and top.pay_time <= CONCAT(#{useEndDate},' 23:59:59') GROUP BY top.result_data ) r where r.result_data = trp.id))),0) useRedCount, IFNULL((SUM((select SUM(r.payValue) from ( select top.result_data, SUM(top.pay_value) payValue from tb_order td inner join tb_order_payment_item top on td.id = top.order_id where td.order_state in (2,10,11,12) and IF(td.is_pos_pay = 1,td.is_pos_pay = 1,td.production_status in (2,3)) and top.payment_mode_id in (${payMode}) and top.pay_time >= CONCAT(#{useBeginDate},' 00:00:00') and top.pay_time <= CONCAT(#{useEndDate},' 23:59:59') GROUP BY top.result_data ) r where r.result_data = trp.id))),0) useRedMoney from tb_red_packet trp where trp.red_type in (${redType}) and trp.create_time >= CONCAT(#{grantBeginDate},' 00:00:00') and trp.create_time <= CONCAT(#{grantEndDate},' 23:59:59') GROUP BY trp.shop_detail_id
